Several Sarcophagi are found in the Jalsavrah Pyramid during the Pyramid Plunder minigame. Opening a closed sarcophagus gives strength experience and has a chance of awakening a mummy which will attack the player that searched the sarcophagus.

Opened sarcophagi can be searched, which will give an artefact which can be sold to Simon Templeton. The chance of successfully opening a sarcophagus is affected by the player's current strength level.[1]

Because most players in the Pyramid Plunder minigame are focused on thieving experience, and because the mummy is quite strong, these sarcophagi are rarely opened.
